StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Center for Common Disease Genomics [CCDG] - Neuropsychiatric: Epilepsy: Epi25 Consortium

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The datasets used for the analysis described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap through dbGaP accession number phs001489. Samples used for data analysis were provided by an international collaboration of more than 30 research groups, working together through the Epi25 Consortium (www.epi-25.org). Support for Epi25 data generation includes the NHGRI Centers for Common Disease Genomics (UM1HG008895).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Epilepsy, Structural Brain Abnormalities, Intellectual Disability, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-EPSBAID-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Epilepsy, Structural Brain Abnormalities, Intellectual Disability and related disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Epilepsy, Structural Brain Abnormalities, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-EPSBA-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Epilepsy, Structural Brain Abnormalities and related disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Epilepsy, Structural Brain Abnormalities, Convulsions, Intellectual Disability, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-EPSBACID-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Epilepsy, Structural Brain Abnormalities, Convulsions, Intellectual Disability and related disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Epilepsy and Epilepsy Comorbidities, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-EPCOM-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Epilepsy and Epilepsy Comorbidities and related disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Epilepsy, Structural Brain Abnormalities, Convulsions, Intellectual Disability, NPU, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-EPSBACID-NPU-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Epilepsy, Structural Brain Abnormalities, Convulsions, Intellectual Disability and related disorders. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Epilepsy, Antiseizure Medicines, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-EPASM-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Epilepsy, Antiseizure Medicines. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Data can be used for research on the causes of epilepsy and/or research on anti-epileptic or anti-seizure drugs as well as the response to treatment.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Epilepsy, Antiseizure Medicines, MDS, RD)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-EPASM-MDS-RD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Epilepsy, Antiseizure Medicines and related disorders. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
Data can be used for research on the causes of epilepsy and/or research on anti-epileptic or anti-seizure drugs as well as the response to treatment.

StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Center for Common Disease Genomics [CCDG] - Neuropsychiatric: Epilepsy: Epi25 Consortium

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The datasets used for the analysis described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap through dbGaP accession number phs001489. Samples used for data analysis were provided by an international collaboration of more than 30 research groups, working together through the Epi25 Consortium (www.epi-25.org). Support for Epi25 data generation includes the NHGRI Centers for Common Disease Genomics (UM1HG008895).

ConsentGroup.title: EPILEPSY, STRUCTURAL BRAIN ABNORMALITIES, INTELLECTUAL DIS, MDS
ConsentGroup.name: EPIL_BRAIN_AB_INTEL_DIS_MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Data can be used for conditions related to epilepsy including structural brain abnormalities, or intellectual disabilities research or methods research

ConsentGroup.title: EPILEPSY, STRUCTURAL BRAIN ABNORMALITIES, MDS
ConsentGroup.name: EPIL_BRAIN_AB_MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Data can be used for conditions related to epilepsy including structural brain abnormalities or methods research

ConsentGroup.title: EPILEPSY, STRUCTURAL BRAIN ABNORMALITIES, CONVULSIONS, INTELLECT DIS, MDS
ConsentGroup.name: EPIL_BRAINAB_CONVUL_INTELCT_DIS_MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Data can be used for conditions related to epilepsy including structural brain abnormalities, febrile convulsions, intellectual disabilities, or methods research

ConsentGroup.title: EPILEPSY AND EPILEPSY COMORBIDITIES, MDS
ConsentGroup.name: EPIL_CO_MORBIDI_MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Data can be used for disorders that co-occur with epilepsy (e.g,, can be used in a study on depression (but not epilepsy).

ConsentGroup.title: EPILEPSY, STRUCTURAL BRAIN ABNORMALITIES, CONVULSIONS, INTELLECT DIS, NPU, MDS
ConsentGroup.name: EPIL_BRAINCONVULS_INTELLECT_DIS_MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Data can be used for conditions related to epilepsy including structural brain abnormalities, febrile convulsions, intellectual disabilities, or methods research; limited to not-for-profit organizations

ConsentGroup.title: EPILEPSY, MULTIPLE CONDITIONS, MDS
ConsentGroup.name: EPIL_MULTIPLE_CONDTIONS_MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Data can be used for research on genes involved in epilepsy and related conditions--including but not limited to: developmental delay, autism, intellectual disability, cerebral palsy, neurodegenerative disorders, or neuropsychiatric conditions, including schizophrenia and depression, and methods research

ConsentGroup.title: EPILEPSY, ANTISEIZURE MEDS, MDS
ConsentGroup.name: EPIL_ANTI_SEIZURE_MEDS_MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Data can be used for research on epilepsy and/or research on anti-epileptic or anti-seizure drugs

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: EPILEPSY, ETIOLOGY, AND ANTISEIZURE DRUGS, MDS
ConsentGroup.name: EPIL_ETIOLOGY_ANTI_SEIZURE_MEDS_MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Data can be used for research on the causes of epilepsy and/or research on the response to anti-epileptic or anti-seizure drug treatment (or both)

ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
